abstract: Belgian brewer InBev is planning to put its Korean beer business up for sale, in an effort to shed a noncore asset and raise what could be approximately $2 billion for its purchase of U.S. brewer Anheuser-Busch, according to Reuters.
lead_paragraph: Belgian brewer InBev is planning to put its Korean beer business up for sale, in an effort to shed a noncore asset and raise what could be approximately $2 billion for its purchase of U.S. brewer Anheuser-Busch, according to Reuters.

headline.main: InBev Said to Plan Auction for Korean Beer Unit
